blog.name: wellthatwasaletdown
blog.title: Former Harrie Club
blog.description:
I created this as a place for former Harry fans who have recently been turned off by his promotion and solo rollout and are now just confused and want to have open discourse about it. I accept submitted posts and will post anything that is not derogatory or rude. Please keep it civil, we are here to talk not belittle each other. Attackers will be blocked.NEW: I will now be cutting off or removing submissions that are just repeating discussions that have already taken place. Please read back if you have a question, chances are it's been answered. As an added note, we are aware that not all Harries are angry people but we sometimes generalize due to character limits, apologies in advance but we know there are many lovely, kind, friendly Harries out there and we don't mean to offend you. <!-- Start of StatCounter Code for Tumblr -->
 
 
 
<!-- End of StatCounter Code for Tumblr -->

summary: Well if you didn’t know this for a reason let me tell you that what Louis does with his hand is known as “the v sign” and it’s a...
caption:
Well if you didn’t know this for a reason let me tell you that what Louis does with his hand is known as “the v sign” and it’s a way to insult people in UK. So yep, he wasn’t wishing peace, he was doing right the opposite.

(there’s a story about the v sign, If you want me to tell it just say it.)

summary: Sidekick of a Superstar - Billboard Magazine Interview
title: Sidekick of a Superstar - Billboard Magazine Interview
body:
It was planned that I make a ‘chapter’ of the interview at the time when it’d be published. So it’s a bit of a throwback. Hope you enjoy it! :) Feedback is highly appreciated

Word count: 1.3k

Series Masterpost

MAIN MASTERLIST

When you arrived in Detroit you got an email from Billboard Magazine. It said that the interview is ready to be published, but you can go through it until today midnight and then they will publish it the next day. It contained a link to the video of the interview.

You saw “Billboard” written on the black background then it said “Billboard Exclusives: y/n y/l/n” and under that “Sony Management.”

Then it showed a few seconds intro where you said: “My name is y/n y/l/n, and this is my first Billboard Magazine interview.” And you smiled in the camera.

“Welcome in your first ever interview!”

“Thank you for having me!”

“So first, tell me about yourself. Where are you coming from?”

“I was born in Manchester. Then my family moved to Wales, but we moved back when I was five and we moved to Cornwall, where I met my best friend, who I am living with in London now. “

“Isn’t she jealous that you’re touring the world now?”

“She’s the best support I can have.”

“That’s really good. But I’m sure everyone is interested in your job right now. You became quite famous, because of it. What did it feel like being in the spotlight?”

“It was weird, but I handled it quite well. Harry, who’s had a lot of spotlights, helped me a lot. He practically is my boss and he taught me a lot of things during our time together. Also, my other bosses from Sony and Jeff Azoff, Harry’s manager, who is teaching me so well.”

“That’s really good.”

“Yes, it is. I’m learning a lot I’m an apprentice, but maybe I can be a manager on my own in the future or have my own management company.”

“That’d be a dream and I think you’d do a great job of it.”

“Thank you!”

“But being a PA wasn’t unfamiliar to you, right?”

“No, I worked for a BBC Radio 1 manager as a personal assistant for four years. She retired at the beginning of this year and I became unemployed. I enjoyed a little free time alone when I got a call the there’s a PA wanted.”

“But you didn’t know it‘s Harry Styles when you applied.”

“No, I didn’t. I wasn’t told and I couldn’t stop thinking about who it could be. I was nervous because I got questions like “Do you mind traveling a lot? Or being in the spotlight?” And I was like “Oh God! Who’s it gonna be?” But it was a nice surprise when I finally met the mysterious man.”

“Did you know him before?”

“No, I mean, I was in the music industry in some way, so I obviously knew about him, but it was just that he’s one-fifth of One Direction, currently on a solo tour. I knew his music, I love it. But we’ve never met before that.”

“What was it like, meeting him for the first time?”

“It’s a life experience. We sat on a couch, he made me tea and offered me some cake that his mum made. It wasn’t even a job interview. We had a friendly conversation. I was nervous in the beginning, but he made it smooth. He’s just a genuine person who cares about anyone who he is talking to. He made me feel I was important. He asked me a lot of questions, but not like “What was your first job? What languages do you speak?” He asked me what my favorite place is and why, or If I could live in any other time, when would I? These were questions you don’t get on a job interview and it made me feel safe about this job. I knew I want to work with him because he’s kind and caring.”

“Wow! Almost shed a tear. It’s a so beautiful story. No wonder you accepted the job. What is it like now?

“It’s just got better. First, it was overwhelming, but I got better in it, I got a lot of help. Harry and I became close friends and it just makes it easier to work with him. I have to be available 24/7, but it’s not a weight on my shoulders, it’s only caring about my friend, and when you have a friend like him, it’s really easy to do so.”

“Yes, that’s true. And what about the crew and the band?”

“Ohh, they really became my family. I’m close with the band members and Hélène, who is the official photographer for the whole tour. The crew is amazing, they’re all hard working and fun people. We have some inner jokes which make work a lot better.“

“I’m sure it’s so much funnier. What will you do when your contract ends in July?“

“I don’t exactly know, there are opportunities and I’ll take the one that is best for me. I enjoy this job and after these months I don’t know if I would do anything else.”

“It’s still something to figure out then.”

“Yeah.”

“I can’t just leave out that you are rumored to be in a closer relationship with Harry. More than just friends.

“He’s a wonderful person and it’s a pleasure to know him personally and even be best friends with him. I wouldn’t change it at all.“

“Now we have time for a game. I’ll ask some questions from this box, the box of interesting questions, and you have to give answers.”

“Sounds fun.“

“Okay, let’s start.“

“Who was the last person you hugged?”

“Mitch Rowland,” you chuckled.

“Favorite t.v. show?”

“Uhm… It’s so hard. Poldark.”

“Favorite song from Harry?”

“Even harder… Sweet Creature”

“If you could travel anywhere, where would you go?”

“Brazil, because I was there recently and it was the best time of my life.”

“Favorite smell?”

“Vanilla”

“What is something that not a lot of people know about you?”

“Uhm… I have food allergies”

“Do you miss anyone?”

Lottie, my best friend”

“What skill would you like to master?”

“Singing” you looked at Harry with a smile.

“What’s your favorite drink?”

“Tea”

“What pets did you have while you were growing up?”

“A dog and two cats”

“Who’s your go-to band or artist when you can’t decide on something to listen to?”

“I’m sorry Harry. 30 seconds to Mars. But Harry is second and very close.” You and the interviewer laughed looking at Harry.

“What’s something you like to do the old-fashioned way?”

“Dating”

“What’s your favorite genre of book or movie?”

“Romantic dramas”

“How do you relax after a hard day of work?”

“I’m constantly at work” you chuckled.

“What is the most annoying question that people ask you?”

“If I’m in a relationship” she looked down because she asked this before. But she wasn’t apologetic, it was just awkward for her.

“What’s something you’ve been meaning to try but just haven’t gotten around to it?”

“uhm…” you grinned looking at Harry who smirked back.

“You looked at Harry.”

“Yeah, no, I’m just… let’s say I want to try a lot of things.” You blushed.

“Big spoon or little spoon?”

“Little spoon, but I was told I’m a good big spoon too.”

“That’s all. Thank you, y/n for doing this interview in your very strict schedule. Good luck with your future plans and we hope to hear from you soon.” She smiled. You smiled into the camera too and it was over.

When you finished watching it, you were satisfied with the video itself. But it hurt seeing that not so long ago you were so happy around Harry. You sent the reply and waited for it to shake the internet. You knew you have a lot of fans and that they know a lot about your secret relationship with Harry and that you probably broke up. They followed your actions and you followed them.

“Ohh, they really became my family. I’m close with the band members and Hélène, who is the official photographer for the whole tour. The crew is amazing, they’re all hard working and fun people. We have some inner jokes which make work a lot better.“

“I’m sure it’s so much funnier. What will you do when your contract ends in July?“

“I don’t exactly know, there are opportunities and I’ll take the one that is best for me. I enjoy this job and after these months I don’t know if I would do anything else.”

“It’s still something to figure out then.”

“Yeah.”

“I can’t just leave out that you are rumored to be in a closer relationship with Harry. More than just friends.

“He’s a wonderful person and it’s a pleasure to know him personally and even be best friends with him. I wouldn’t change it at all.“

“Now we have time for a game. I’ll ask some questions from this box, the box of interesting questions, and you have to give answers.”

“Sounds fun.“

“Okay, let’s start.“

“Who was the last person you hugged?”

“Mitch Rowland,” you chuckled.

“Favorite t.v. show?”

“Uhm… It’s so hard. Poldark.”

“Favorite song from Harry?”

“Even harder… Sweet Creature”

“If you could travel anywhere, where would you go?”

“Brazil, because I was there recently and it was the best time of my life.”

“Favorite smell?”

“Vanilla”

“What is something that not a lot of people know about you?”

“Uhm… I have food allergies”

“Do you miss anyone?”

Lottie, my best friend”

“What skill would you like to master?”

“Singing” you looked at Harry with a smile.

“What’s your favorite drink?”

“Tea”

“What pets did you have while you were growing up?”

“A dog and two cats”

“Who’s your go-to band or artist when you can’t decide on something to listen to?”

“I’m sorry Harry. 30 seconds to Mars. But Harry is second and very close.” You and the interviewer laughed looking at Harry.

“What’s something you like to do the old-fashioned way?”

“Dating”

“What’s your favorite genre of book or movie?”

“Romantic dramas”

“How do you relax after a hard day of work?”

“I’m constantly at work” you chuckled.

“What is the most annoying question that people ask you?”

“If I’m in a relationship” she looked down because she asked this before. But she wasn’t apologetic, it was just awkward for her.

“What’s something you’ve been meaning to try but just haven’t gotten around to it?”

“uhm…” you grinned looking at Harry who smirked back.

“You looked at Harry.”

“Yeah, no, I’m just… let’s say I want to try a lot of things.” You blushed.

“Big spoon or little spoon?”

“Little spoon, but I was told I’m a good big spoon too.”

“That’s all. Thank you, y/n for doing this interview in your very strict schedule. Good luck with your future plans and we hope to hear from you soon.” She smiled. You smiled into the camera too and it was over.

When you finished watching it, you were satisfied with the video itself. But it hurt seeing that not so long ago you were so happy around Harry. You sent the reply and waited for it to shake the internet. You knew you have a lot of fans and that they know a lot about your secret relationship with Harry and that you probably broke up. They followed your actions and you followed them.

summary: Hey, I just wanted to pop real fast to remind all of you who genuinely “ship” or think Harry Styles is dating Kaia Gerber that...
body: Hey, I just wanted to pop real fast to remind all of you who genuinely “ship” or think Harry Styles is dating Kaia Gerber that you’d be supporting pedophilia and a pedophile. Harry is a full grown, 25-years-old man and Kaia is just barely 17. That be disgusting and if that was the case y’all should be unstanning real fast, not thinking it’s cute. Thanks.

blog.name: oh-styles
blog.title: o h s t y l e s

summary: God Ollie is the cutest best bub ever since he's a surprise when they announce his birth do they get a rush of baby gifts or do...
question: God Ollie is the cutest best bub ever since he's a surprise when they announce his birth do they get a rush of baby gifts or do they run out and buy a bunch once he's born? Does he wear loves old onesies ?
answer:
It’s actually a little bit of all of that. Anne and Gemma swoop in, buying as many newborn diapers as they can find, some baby shampoo and body wash, the grooming kits, clothes – everything. The missus does still have some of Love’s baby things, but most of it she gave away for some extra money. They have to go out and get a crib, a bassinet, bottles, baby monitors, burp clothes, cartseat, breast pump… the list goes on and on. They are very overwhelmed, and it doesn’t help that they have to all of this by the time she is due to leave the hospital, but they have a newborn baby now and aren’t mentally prepared in the slightest. A lot of their friends and family go out and get them these things, just so they don’t have to stress themselves out any more than they are. And Oliver does wear some of Love’s old onesies, lmao. The ones with her name on it, the missus couldn’t find it in her to give those away. She said if she ever had another girl, it would be perfect for her. Except she didn’t know she would be having a son…and he would be the one wearing them when he runs out of clean newborn clothes.

Honestly, Anne is their savior. She helped immensely, and had some of her friends too. Nearly everything they got in the first week, was from her. Harry ended up buying a lot of other things online and had it delivered to the house, but the important things like the carseat, diapers, bassinet, bottles, etc. was all her. And they are forever in debt.

summary: I don't know why but I'm just thinking about the saaf couple taking a midnight drive to McDonald's and sitting in the parking...
question: I don't know why but I'm just thinking about the saaf couple taking a midnight drive to McDonald's and sitting in the parking lot goofing around after some party or event they were at eating fries in their expensive clothes
answer:
YES, that is totally them. And Harry vows to never eat McDonalds, but give him some shots of vodka, and he forgets all about his high-end diet. They make a bet if the ice cream machine is working, and whoever is wrong has to pay, but even though SAAF y/n was wrong, Harry still paid like the gentleman he is. 

They share an Oreo McFlurry, dipping their fries in it, and even putting an extra long fry in each others mouth and pretending like they are the dogs from Lady and the Tramp. 

Harry cringes has he wipes his greasy, salty fingers off on his pants, until she finds the napkins at the bottom of the bag. 

“I really want some nuggets now.”

“Did you see how they are made?”

“Yeah, and I still want me some fucking nuggets.”
